page.title: 12HOME LIFE A Day at School
page.content: The first noise I heard was my Mum's radio alarm clock,it was about 6.50am, I got up, had a wash and got dressed. For breakfast I had coffee and a slice of toast.... ....I packed my bags and we went to school in the car.... we dropped Mum off at Victoria Road because she is a {crossing patrol lady...}we went straight into the playground and waited for the{whistle.. { }.... At school after{assembly}we had {Maths}which was about decimals, after play we had{PE}on the{apparatus}and then in{art,}started to make some wire and tissue paper butterflies.... ....After our{school dinner}and play we had{French}and then continued to make the butterflies .... after last play we worked on our Domesday { {project}until home time .... ..In the evening I watched TV ....
